dialogue: Time is not a river... it is an ocean.
Every moment exists eternally in the Depths.
The Leviathans see all times at once. They remember what has not yet happened.
I am from a future that no longer exists.
The sleeping one dreams of when it was awake.
Focus... and you may glimpse your own echoes.
Step through, and you step through time itself.
Not all who enter emerge in the same when.

interactables.content: Before there was light, there was the Depth. And in the Depth, time had no meaning.
The first Leviathan to master temporal focusing created this sanctuary at the bottom of existence.
The Architects feared what slept here. Their war was an attempt to keep it dreaming forever.

interactables.description: Focus here to add your temporal signature to the eternal record.
Gaze into the pool to see moments from your past sessions.

lore.title: The Eternal Abyss
fragments: In the beginning, there was only the Depth - an infinite ocean where time pooled like water.
The First Leviathan discovered that by focusing deeply, one could swim through time itself.
It created this sanctuary where all moments exist simultaneously, preserved forever.
The Architects found this place and tried to drain the ocean of time, to control all futures.
They failed. The Leviathan still sleeps here, dreaming all possible realities at once.
Those who focus deeply enough may glimpse its dreams... and add their own.
Welcome to Kronos Depths. Here, you are eternal.

evolutionStages.effect: Bioluminescent flora begins to pulse in sync
Temporal echoes of past visitors appear
The Chrono-Spire activates, showing glimpses of the future
The Rift Gateway allows travel to other public worlds
KRONOS AWAKENS - All visitors gain the Timeless title
